title: Compare Performance Year-over-Year
description: An analyst needs to compare website traffic for the last quarter to the same quarter in the previous year.

tasks.description: In the analytics tool, select the date range for the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct date range.

tasks.description: Use the 'compare to' feature to select the same date range from the previous year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool is now configured to show a year-over-year comparison.

tasks.description: Analyze the results to determine the percentage change in key metrics like users, sessions, and conversion rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a summary of the year-over-year growth or decline.
